title: Snowbound with the Soldier
description: Maybe this Christmas...?It has been seven long years since Kara Jameson last saw Jason Greene. Returning home as a wounded war hero, Jason looks a shell of the man she once knew. Yet her heart still skips a beat as if it was yesterday....Stepping back into civilian life, Jason looks to Kara for help. But there's too much water under the bridge - not to mention too much lingering attraction.But it seems that the mountain weather has other ideas, and when Kara and Jason end up snowbound together they are forced to confront the ghosts of Christmas past.
author: Jennifer Faye
